Package gobblin.source.extractor.filebased

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileBasedHelper  
    SizeAwareFileBasedHelper
    A File helper that extends FileBasedHelper and has functionality to get file size.
    TimestampAwareFileBasedHelper
    A File helper that extends SizeAwareFileBasedHelper and has functionality to get file modified time.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CsvFileDownloader
    A FileDownloader that downloads a single file and iterates line by line.
    FileBasedExtractor<S,D>
    Abstract class for file based extractors
    FileBasedSource<S,D>
    This class is a base class for file based sources, it provides default functionality for keeping track of which files have already been pulled by the framework and for determining which files need to be pulled in this run
    FileByteIterator  
    FileDownloader<D>
    An abstraction for downloading a file in a FileBasedExtractor.
    GZIPFileDownloader<D>
    A FileDownloader that downloads a single gzip file and iterates line by line.
    SingleFileDownloader<D>
    A FileDownloader that downloads a single file and iterates line by line.
    SizeAwareFileBasedHelperDecorator
    A decorator that delegates to inner FileBasedHelper.
    TextFileBasedSource
    A source that reads text based input from a directory as lines.
    TokenBasedFileInputStreamExtractor
    Extends FileBasedExtractor and uses TokenizedFileDownloader.
    TokenizedFileDownloader
    Extends FileBasedExtractor which generates Iterator using TokenizedFileDownloader.token when TokenizedFileDownloader.downloadFile(String).
    TokenizedFileDownloader.RecordIterator  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FileBasedExtractor.CounterNames  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FileBasedHelperException
